cv.title: Empowering Creative Pedagogies with AI
cv.description: Bevilliget af Novo Nordisk Fonden. 4-dages kursus om AI og kreativ pædagogik.
cv.detail: This professional development course supports high school teachers in integrating AI-supported creative pedagogies - such as Problem-Based Learning (PBL) - to foster students’ creative problem-solving skills. Participants will explore how AI tools can enhance student engagement, inquiry, collaboration, and creativity.
